pages.text: Minuteman statues are magical objects that display anomalous effects within battlefield biomes. They are only found inside the fortified towns you might rarely find within these areas.$(br2)They will spawn a new $(l:neutral_creatures/minuteman)minuteman$() periodically until it has reached a sufficient threshold.
$(o)It's a small figure standing on a hill.

If you feel no remorse in destroying a town, using these statues may be beneficial in your own fortifications as the minutemen will target nearby enemies.$(br)Of course, damaging one of them will alert the entire army, and you may become overrun!
